title: Verbal Abuse
body: Now is this verbal abuse so 3 of my team is low hp and running from teamfight getting chased by enemy xin i turn and slow him then morph him with lulu we then kill him i then type in all chat Leave my Lee alone only thing i said all game and i get reported for verbal abuse and this has been going on for like 6 games in a row a report for verbal abuse which im not even doing

replies.body: mute them and stop crying, problem solved.
If you've got nothing to hide then you've got nothing to worry about.
Rito checks over the game chat logs for these things, so if you are innocent you wont be punished, dw.
